PageTitle: Use virtual data rooms for enhanced file security and transparency
PageDescription: Organize secure storage and sharing of confidential business information in ONLYOFFICE DocSpace
UseVirtualDataRooms: Use <0>virtual data rooms</0> for enhanced file security and transparency
OrganizeSecure: Organize secure storage and sharing of confidential business information in ONLYOFFICE DocSpace
IdealForDueDiligenceDesc: Use VDR for due diligence when merging, working on a project with other companies, or other joint venture that requires access to shared data.
CompletelyOrganizedDesc: Automatically index and track all content to keep excellent records and stay organized. Generate a summary report on the room file structure.
HighLevelOfDataSecurityDesc: Enable watermarks, set file lifetime, restrict downloading and copying to protect your sensitive records.
AdvancedRoleBasedText: Invite your team and assign roles that perfectly align with your company's organizational structure. Track form progress in real-time. Easily view completed and pending forms, finalize them and retrieve finished versions for a smooth process.
CostEffectiveForAnyBudgetDesc: Pay for admins only and add any number of regular users and guests for free. Benefit from a free Startup plan for small teams. ONLYOFFICE DocSpace is suitable for all businesses, no matter if it's SMB or a big enterprise. Want to get full control over your corporate data? Deploy DocSpace on your private server.
